purpose_text.para: Holds accumulated Tag Check Faults occurring in EL2 that are not taken precisely.

configuration_text.para: If EL2 is not implemented, this register is RES0 from EL3.

field_description.para: Tag Check Fault. Asynchronously set to 1 when a Tag Check Fault using a virtual address with bit[55] == 0b1 occurs.
When the Effective value of HCR_EL2.E2H is not 1, this field is RES0.
Tag Check Fault. Asynchronously set to 1 when a Tag Check Fault using a virtual address with bit[55] == 0b0 occurs.

access_permission_text.para: When the Effective value of HCR_EL2.E2H is 1, without explicit synchronization, accesses from EL2 using the accessor name TFSR_EL2 or TFSR_EL1 are not guaranteed to be ordered with respect to accesses using the other accessor name.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
MRS
MSRregister
